title: Calories in Egg McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calorie in egg mcmuffin details: 310 kcal per serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and fast-food tweaks for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Egg McMuffin: toasted English muffin, folded egg, Canadian bacon, American cheese; no customizations or additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Egg McMuffin has 310 kcal, 17 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 310 kcal for a standard Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Egg McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 17 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: Does Egg McMuffin have trans fats?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard recipe.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an Egg McMuffin?
Can I make a lower-calorie Egg McMuffin at home?
faqs.a: Yes, skip cheese or use turkey bacon to reduce calories by 50+ kcal.
